original_title: Bill's Dirty Shorts: A Collection of Bill Plympton's Newest Naughty Shorts
overview: A collection of Bill Plymptons newest naughty shorts. This DVD contains 80 minutes of material from the years to 2002. Includes short films: ""Sex and Violence""; ""The Exciting Life of a Tree""; ""More Sex and Violence""; ""You Can't Drag Race with Jesus""; ""Eat""; ""Parking""; and many others. Contains Adult Material!
title: Bill's Dirty Shorts: A Collection of Bill Plympton's Newest Naughty Shorts
